wiki_section_title: Offseason -- CFL Draft

wiki_section_text: 

intro: The 1990 BC Lions finished in fourth place in the West Division with a 6-11-1 record and failed to make to playoffs.

qa.question: In what state did the BC Lions athlete who was the 34th pick in the draft attend school ?
